mapper.select: SELECT RTN_SEQ, ADM_SEQ, RTN_NAME, RTN_CONTENT, RTN_CREATED_DATE, RTN_URL, RTN_TARGET, RTN_DURATION, RTN_DIFFICULTY FROM ROUTINE WHERE RTN_TARGET = #{rtnTarget} AND RTN_DURATION = #{rtnDuration} AND RTN_DIFFICULTY = #{rtnDifficulty}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ROUTINE (adm_seq, rtn_name, rtn_content, rtn_created_date, rtn_url, rtn_target, rtn_duration, rtn_difficulty) VALUES (#{admSeq}, #{rtnName}, #{rtnContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{rtnUrl}, #{rtnTarget}, #{rtnDuration}, #{rtnDifficulty})
SELECT RTN_SEQ_PK.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
